11.content:
You are a pokemon trainer who is entering the lucid city of Cerulean. You couldn't wait to challenge the gym leader and win your next badge. You found the gym building and entered inside. You continued walking to only see a humongous pool. You were shocked at the fact that it nearly took all the space in the room! It wasn't still you laid eyes off the pool did you see such a magnificent sight.

Out of the water came a girl. Her orange hair flowed with the sparkle and droplets of water. Her face was was lucid and majestic as she caught glimpse of you. You quickly turned a shade of red as she looked at you. As she glanced at you she quickly dived and got out of the water. She sat down and dried off, her towel covering her head. Calming your emotions down, you walked over to her. "Er..h-hey!" you manage to say. She jumped, shocked that someone was there. She uncovered the towel from her head.

"Oh hi, are you a trainer?" she asked. You answered kinda stutterly "Uh, y-yeah." "Oh, well sorry to disappoint you, but I can't really take challenges right now." she replied. You ,however, did feel disappointed. "Oh, that's too bad." you said. She noticed this, and tried to make you feel better. "Oh, you're looking pretty uncomfotable, here, sit with me." she persisted. You turned a little red, but cooled down quickly. "Uh..sure." you answered.

You sat down next to her, still drying her head. "Oh by the way, I'm Misty!" she said through her towel. "Nice to meet you, Misty," you smiled. "Oh, I almost forgot, I saw you in the water, and you looked great!" you commented. "Oh thank you!" she said.

Accidently, while drying off, her elbow prodded you in the side. You burst into giggles. "Hehehehehehehehehehehehehe!" you giggle. Misty uncovered her towel and looked at you in confusment. "Huh!?" she said. She had a blank faced as she poked you into the side again. "HeheheheheyMihihihihstycuhuhuhtihihihtout!" you giggle.

Misty's confused look turned into a sly grin. "Heehee, are you ticklish?" she asked you. You couldn't help but shudder. "Insanely, and before you get any ideas, I gotta admit though I kinda have a tickle phobia." you admit. Her sly look turned bcak to confusion. "A tickle phobia how come?" she asked.

You let out a sigh, knowing you'd have to explain something you've been through many times. "Yeah, when I was a beginner trainer, I got on the bad side of a pokemon, and it tickled me crazy. Honestly, I thought I was gonna die." you shuddered again. Misty face turned sad this time, "I am so sorry, hasn't anyone tried to help you?" she asked. "Who, would help...let alone believe me.." you thought out loud...

Misty seemed worried for you. "Poor guy, maybe I could do something for him.." she thought to herself..

12.content:
you are lying barefoot (or with your shoes on) on a tree, staring up into the leafy branches above you. you're wondering what you're going to do for the rest of the day when you feel something brush against your foot. you giggle like mad, shuddering at an old memory. though you're rather brave, you only have one weakness, and you really hate it. the fact that you're insanely ticklish, and thanks to an incident you had, you have a fear of being tickled.

"Excuse me?" a female voice suddenly interupts your thoughts. as you look down from the branches, you see a brown haired girl with a red bandana. "Is it alright if i sit here?"

"Er, s....sure, go ahead" you splutter. the girl grins and sits next to you.

"By the way, i'm May" she says with a grin.

"Oh, right. nice to meet you" you say, not breaking your glance with the leaves above. May, rather confused with this, pokes you in the side to get some attention. you squeal and recoil from her finger. May, rather confused, grins at you and pokes you in the side again.

"QUIT IT!" you squeal and jump up.

May who is grinning like mad, gets to her feet and walks up to you. "looks like someone is rather ticklish" she taunts.

"aactually, i sort of have a fear of being tickled" you admit, with a serious amount of guilt in your voice.

May's grin quickly turns to a look of confusion. "a fear of being tickled?" she says puzzled.

"uh.... yeah" you grumble. "when i started out as a pokemon trainer, i sort of got on the wrong side of a tangela. it tied me up and tickled me silly 'til i cried" you shudder at that memory, "I've been scared of being tickled ever since" May's look of confusion turns into a silly grin and she bursts into a fit of giggles. "What?" you say, confused, "What's so funny?"

May, recovering from her giggles, grins at you. "Don't you think it's a bit odd to have a fear of being tickled?" she says.

You sigh as you sit back down, back to the tree. "I've been asking myself that since that incident with the tangela"

12223211.content:
May, still slightly red in the face, turned to her pokemon and explained her plan. She needed it to be just her tickling you for her next tactic, thus she returned Skitty, Bulbasaur, and Combusken. Before you could regain enough breath to consider running away, the girl in red pounced on your legs, facing your torso. With a foxlike grin she pinned your wrists to the ground under her knees before sitting the full weight of her body down on your legs, making you flush a brighter shade of red. The girl didn't weight much, so her improvised restaints didn't cause you any pain. Her position did, however, deny you any leverage, so you were effectively helpless.

May then bent over, making sure to keep most of her weight on your legs. Those gymnastics classes she enrolled in for contests came in handy off the stage too. In this position, her face ended up being only a few centimeters below your own. Your startled eyes met her now innocent ones, and you turned even redder with a nervous laugh. That is, until you noticed the contact of certain -ahem- parts on your chest; then you turned positively crimson. May noticed this, and her eyes reverted back to their sly angles. You seemed to be unable to take your eyes off May's face, noting its closeness to you. The girl's eyes were but an inch and a half away from you, her lips only two from your own. Her nose could bump up against your chin, and the twin strands of her brown hair tickled your neck.

However, that wasn't the only thing tickling you. May's hands had found their way back to your stomach, which was made taut by the added pressure her torso placed on yours now that the support of her arms had vanished. Ever so subtly, the well-manicured nails of her index fingers scratched around your abdomen. You didn't care how subtly she did it, though, as it caused you instant torment. May turned her face aside to dodge the salvo of saliva that the force of your laughter sent airborne before taunting you once more. If you had opened your eyes (which had no problem dropping the attention of May's face in light of the tickling), you would've noticed that her face was growing redder as well.

"What's the matter?" came the playful voice, "Are two little nails too much for you? Well then, I think that they need company, don't you?"

"NO! Nohohohoho- MAY STAHAHAHAHAHAP ITHIHIHIHIT! I don't think THIHIHIHIS IHIS HELPING!!" You managed to say, your voice being manipulated by the girl tickling you rapidly then stopping. May put on an innocent, confused expression before chiding you some more.

"But they say exposure therapy is the best way to get over a phobia!" Her face went back to a fox's, "Don't tell me that you aren't enjoying this. A cute girl like me taking time out of my day to help you."

At the mention of "me," May made herself more comfortable on her human bed and grabbed one of her Combusken's feathers with her right hand. Her left index finger wormed its way into your navel and began wriggling around. This didn't tickle quite as bad now that her nails couldn't scratch over your skin, but it still have you heck. To top things off, the girl playfully blew into your ear while wrapping her right arm around your head and positioning the feather at your neck. She twirled it around, causing you to bark with laughter and twitch your neck in the direction of the feather. Unfortunately, this left the other side of your neck wide open, and a red-faced May with her eyes still locked on yours quickly licked your neck. Out of instinct your neck snapped the opposite direction, but May simply twirled the feather again. The girl kept on repeating this pattern until a change occurred.

May was having a hard time keeping the controlled tickling going. Her left index finger, which had been fumbling around in the darkness of your navel, was joined by the other four digits of her hand and began spider tickling your abdomen. A bit later, May forsook the feather in favor of using her nails on the base of your neck. The girl eventually gave up her playful little licks and seized your neck between her lips before blowing a raspberry. However, in her beserk state, the pressure of her knee on your right hand loosened just enough for you to wrench it free. You tapped the button on one of the pokeballs at your belt, and then used your hand to gain leverage over the weaker, lighter girl. You managed to sit up, and May's arm reflexively wrapped around your neck. It would've been a cute scene under any other circumstances, but you were now angry. This wasn't helping you, it was torturing you. No one could help you unless they had been through what you had, and you intended to show May just that. With a knowing look at your Lileep, who had just materialized out of the white light, you bellowed at a startled, but still playful May.

"IT'S NOT HELPING ME!!" Lileep then...
12223211.title: Playfully seducing tickles

122232111.content:
Your trusty fossil pokemon moved behind the tree May had first found you under as fast as its suction cupped feet would carry it. The girl in question was still acting as playful as ever, making you even more angry and frustrated. It wasn't in your blood to ever harm a girl physically, but as the old saying goes, she needed to walk a mile in your shoes before trying to help.

"If you'd have just let me tickle you a little more, I could've helped!" said May in a false accusatory tone.

"You don't understand what I've been through. You can't help me by doing the exact same thing that pokemon did..." You replied through a moodly glare. May dropped the act she was putting on when she saw that you were being serious, and tried to take up for herself. Her sentence was cut off, however, by an orange vine wrapping around her waist. Lileep, using its Constrict attack, hauled May up next to the tree before clamping down. Her hands were squeezed next to her thighs, and a wince of pain crossed her face.

"Lileep! Not so tight!" you scolded your pokemon, which instantly let up on the pressure. You stood up, and the Sea Lily pokemon wrapped another of its many tendrils around May's ankles, making sure to bind them together without causing discomfort to the girl.

"Hey! This isn't going to helf oo!" Ever so carefully, Lileep threaded a vine across the girl's now open mouth and pulled her head back against the tree.

"Because you don't understand what I've been through, I plan to teach you." You succinntly said. You moved your first two fingers of each hand to May's neck, which was perfectly exposed to tickling, and proceeded to attack it. Your new captive reflexively tried to clamp her chin down on the source of the tickling sensations, but every time her jawbone or teeth would meet Lileep's vine. She tried biting down on the rubbery appendage, but your pokemon, a dual Rock/Grass type, didn't feel anything.

"AHAHAHAHAHA Daf TICKLESH!!" Her protests were warped by the vine pulling at the sides of her lips. You didn't stop there though, rather you simply added more fingers into the fray. After exloring the mountain of the girl's throat and the crevice of her collarbone, you knelt on one knee and ran your hands under the girl's shirt to get at her stomach. Using the same method (only less effective due to your closely trimmed nails) that May used on you, you tormented the girl.

"AHYIHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!! STOHAHAHAHAF IHIHIHIII!!" She begged. A faint glimmer of doubt shot through the back of your mind at her shrieking, but was soon crushed by the memory of your torment only a couple of minutes ago. With redoubled effort you tickled her stomach, unable to get to her ribs for her arms. After a while you ceased using your fingers to tickle May, and pressed your open mouth over her navel.

The girl's laughter raised a pitch when you dipped your tongue in the hollow of her stomach. only to die down after you removed it. A few more passes of this didn't get any great results, so you resorted to blowing raspberries on her stomach. This the poor girl simply couldn't bear, sending her into hysterics.

"STAF STAF STAHAHAHAHAF I'UM HOING HU HEHEHEHEHEHEE!" You didn't really make anything out of this other than three successive pleas to stop, so you added your fingers back into the works. Just when she thought she would break, May managed to wrench a hand free and push your head away from her stomach.

May was still breathing heavily, and you took this opportunity to extend a small hand of mercy to her. You told Lileep to release her arms, and it did so. Then, however, you lifted both of the girl's arms above her head and asked your fossil pokemon to bind her again there. The pokemon put one of its vines over a tree branch, and then snaked it back down and around May's wrists, making a makeshift pulley that allowed it to hold the position longer. You stepped behind the tree.

"Wha are ya ooing now?" May asked, slightly exhausted but otherwise in an enjoyable mood. You didn't answer, but rather wondered how she could still be friendly after all that. Considering that having May in an "enjoyable mood" wasn't your goal, you dug your fingers into her armpits, which were covered by her shirt sleeves. For all the noise she made, you assumed that she was fairly ticklish there. May tried her best to move away from the tickling, but Lileep wrapped another vine around her waist out of its own accord, staunching the worst of the flailing girl's movement.

You began to feel the need to move to another place, and shifted to May's ribcage. The taut skin around the ribs proved harder to tickle without bruising her, but your undulating fingers moved the fabric of May's shirt around, making the creases of it lightly brush all over her upper body. From you position behind the tree, it was hard to see exactly where your fingers were going, and you suddenly felt soft, warm, malleable flesh under your fingers rather than the bone of her ribs. It took you a few seconds to figure out what had happened, but when you did, you removed your fingers as though they had been a hot pan. Speaking of hot pans, both your face and May's face (as you came back around the tree to investigate) resembled them.

"Heeeeeeey!" A scandalized looking May shouted at you the best she could in a whiny voice.

"Sorry, sorry!" You answered, hanging your head and keeping your hands behind you for a second. It was an honest mistake; the idea was to torture her, not to molest her. You shook off the embarassment and rolled May's shirt up, exposing her midriff. Before going back behind the tree you soaked up the sight of her bare stomach. Your face regained its red color, and you wondered if you were really beginning to enjoy this.

Back behind the tree, you plowed into May's sides, and almost instantly were rewarded with peals of laughter. You moved one hand to her stomach and scratched around her navel again, sometimes dipping in an out of it to keep things lively.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH! STAFIHI'UMHOINGHUHEHEHEHEHEHEEE!!!" Came May's shirll laughter. The protest afterwards was reduced to incoherent babble. You left one hand to torment the girl's naked stomach, while the other moved down to her hip. The laughter died off a bit, and you moved the hand to her stomach. Now with twice the tickling force, May could not bear it any longer. The dark fabric of her shorts turned darker, and her legs clenched together followed by her face turning three different shades of red. Tears began to prick the corners of her eyes, but you couldn't see any of this for the bark of the tree. Rather, you were debating whether or not to let the rest of your pokemon out for a piece of the fun or not...

14131.content:
So apparently Serena has a double that you didn't know of and while you were walking down the street you saw her. You have always had a crush on her but we're afraid that Ash kid was gonna get to her first. So immediately you strike a conversation with her.

"Hey, I'm Sean." You say.

"Hi, I'm Serena" she says back. "You look familiar. Have we met?"

"Yeah, we met. We were at Frunch Park, remember? Back on South Rd?" Sean said, trying to get her to remember.

"No. We've never met, I was just kidding!" She told him "or were you just playing along?" She says. You instantly realize that she is not who you are thinking of even though she dresses, speaks, and looks just like Serena.

"Come with me!" She says cheerfully.This is GREAT, you think. She looks and acts just like your crush. Why not go with her? What could go wrong?

She leads you into a building. It is in an allyway. But it does not look shady. The front of the building is bright and vibrant colored, despite being tucked away in a dark ally. There is no sign on the front to give any hint as to what it is. But from the colors you could guess that it is a sweet shop.

As you enter, you see nice looking furniture, a coffee stand and an upstairs. Where does it lead? The lighting is comfortable and the bathroom is close by. There is a girl working the coffee area. It's Serena!

"Hi, how can I help you?" She asks.

"Uhhh--- well--- um-- you see--" You sputter. You can't believe yourself. You can talk to Serena's double but you can't talk to Serena? Finally Serena speaks up.

"He's with me. We would both like your very best coffee" Serena says.

"Coming right up!" The Serena working the stand says.

"Wait" you manage to get out. "Do you know her?" You ask, curious that Serena has not brought up her double yet.

"Yes, I actually do. We are great friends" she says.

rrrrriiiiinnnggg!!

info.description:
you're a male pokemon trainer in the pokemon world. you're brave, smart and quick on your feet. but you have a major weakness, and you hate it. you are insanely ticklish and thanks to an incident when you started as a pokemon trainer, you have a fear of being tickled. unfortunantly, when you meet someone while you are resting, your tickle fear is about to be exploited.

basically you choose to tickle or be tickled by the girls from pokemon.

No nudity
No sex stuff
No killing
use up to 6 pokemon
